metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7949 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: Multiple buffer overflows in the (1) XvQueryAdaptors and (2) XvQueryEncodings functions in X.org libXrender before 0.9.10 allow remote X servers to trigger out-of-bounds write operations via vectors involving length fields.

criterions.comment: libxrender package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:0.9.10-1').
